The glorious name of God, The Lord of Hosts opened in two sermons, at Michaels Cornhill, London, vindicating the Commission from this Lord of Hosts, to subjects, in some case, to take up arms : with a post-script, briefly answering a late treatise by Henry Ferne, D.D. / by Jer. Burroughes. Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
[8], 128, 14 p.
Printed for R. Dawlman, London : 1643.
Errors in paging. Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
=======

Burroughes. Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
